project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective of the Xiamen Port Project is to assist the Government in its efforts to improve operations, relieve congestion and increase the handling capacity of the ports subsector. The project includes developments at Xiamen port which consist of: (i) construction of one container berth, two multi-purpose berths capable of being converted to container berths as and when needed, and one coal berth, together with the necessary infrastructure; (ii) provision of the required cargo handling, communications, and environmental protection equipment; and (iii) provision of training and technical assistance for master planning, construction supervision, and implementation of an improvement action plan.

P003515.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>厦门港项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是协助厦门市政府努力提高港口行业运营效率，缓解港口拥堵状况，增加港口吞吐能力。项目的具体建设内容包括：（1）建设一个集装箱泊位、两个可改建为集装箱泊位的综合性泊位、一个煤炭装卸泊位（如需要）以及配套基础设施；（2）提供所需的货物装卸、通信和环境保护设备；（3）就总体规划编制、施工监理和改造行动计划等内容提供培训和技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
